description:
Alpha 2 of System76’s COMIC desktop is now available for public testing bringing exciting enhancements. Learn all about the new features here!

The post COSMIC Desktop Alpha 2 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: COSMIC Desktop Alpha 2 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Discover a step-by-step guide to install Ghost on Ubuntu, then create and set up a new Ghost site and configure Ghost with Nginx.

The post How to Install, Setup, and Use Ghost on Ubuntu (Ultimate Guide) appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install, Setup, and Use Ghost on Ubuntu (Ultimate Guide)
